useCase.name: Buy iPhone2017
useCase.description: Wang wants to purchase an iPhone2017.
useCase.trigger: Wang decides to buy an iPhone2017 from js.

mainSequence.step: Wang asks js for the iPhone2017.
js offers the iPhone2017 for 10000 yuan.
Wang decides to proceed with the purchase.
Wang completes the payment via Alipay.
Alipay transfers the payment to js.
js hands over the iPhone2017 to Wang.

asteps.step: Wang borrows 10000 yuan from debit at 10% monthly interest.
Wang gives the borrowed amount to js.
js hands over the iPhone2017 to Wang.
Wang struggles financially and eats dust for half a year.
